fields.name: Address
fields.description: The address where the violation is located

fields.name: Address Key
fields.description: Unique Address Identifier in L+I Hansen Database  Each Address is assigned a unique identifier in the L+I Hansen database.

fields.name: AP FAIL KEY
fields.description: The unique identifier for each individual violation written

fields.name: AP Type
fields.description: Case Type The department responsible for a case

fields.name: Case Added Date
fields.description: The date the case was added into the L+I Hansen system

fields.name: Case Number
fields.description: Unique identifier for a case

fields.name: Case Resolution Code
fields.description: A L+I defined resolution code, or what resulted in a case being marked as resolved

fields.name: Case Resolution Date
fields.description: Date a case was resolved

fields.name: Census Tract
fields.description: Census Tract in which the address is located

fields.name: Council District
fields.description: City Council District

fields.name: Most Recent Inspection
fields.description: The date that the violation was most recently inspected by an L+I inspector

fields.name: Opa Account Num
fields.description:
Office of Property Assessment Account Number' Every land parcel within the City of Philadelphia is assigned a unique account number from OPA. This number stays with the property for as long as the deed is held by the same owner. Once a property transfers ownership, it is assigned a new OPA account number and the old one is retired.
 This field can be used as a join key for various city datasets. It is also sometimes known as the 'BRT' number or within some datasets coming directly from OPA is also called the 'PARCEL_NUMBER'. (Other departments may use different internal 'Parcel Numbers', so please verify before using).

fields.name: Organization
fields.description: Organization associated with the owner contact

fields.name: Owner Name
fields.description: The contact that is identified as the current owner of the address.

fields.name: Status
fields.description: The status of the violation

fields.name: Unit
fields.description: Sub-designation identifier. Suite number, apartment number, or any other additional address designation.

fields.name: Violation Date
fields.description: Date of Violation Date

fields.name: Violation Description
fields.description: The description of the type of violation

fields.name: Violation Type
fields.description: The type of violation. For more detail, visit http://www.phila.gov/li/codesandregulations/Pages/codes.aspx

fields.name: Zip
fields.description: ZIP+4 or postal code of the address.
